QuestData.Title: Drustfall
QuestData.Description: I believe I see more carvings at the entrance to that cave over there. Come, we should see what else was left behind.
QuestData.RewardText: The carvings could have been Drust propaganda stating he lived, but that voice! <Cleardawn's face becomes grim> It seems we may have all been mistaken about the ultimate fate of Gorak Tul. I shudder to think what he might be planning now.
